New Records: Liam Scales scored his first goal for Ireland
Robbie Brady scored a goal and an assist in a starring display
Key Match Events: Robbie Brady scored the winning goal for Ireland
Liam Scales scored a header to the top corner for Ireland
Finland had a goal disallowed for Ireland
Nathan Collins made a mistake that led to Finland's goal
Pre-Game Insights: Heimir Hallgrímsson needs to find a way to get a positive result in the game
Hallgrímsson suggests it will be four at the back for this game
Ireland are desperate to relieve the sinking feeling in Finland
Ken Early wrote that maybe it's time to look at this with fresh eyes and ask: have we been too down on the idea of losing?
Post-Match Reflections: Hallgrímsson said that mistakes are something that just happens in football, and they were happy with what they were doing
Robbie Brady said that it was up there for his best moments, and he was delighted to get the win
Hallgrímsson said that they should be happy with the performance, and they need to start thinking about Greece
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a crazy finish for England in their match against Greece
Ireland only three points behind England in the group now
The game was a surprise score in the other game in the group - England losing to Greece 1-0 at Wembley
